pullrequest.title: Avoid hardcoding /machine:x64 flag on 64-bit on MSVC with CMake >= 3.5

content.raw:
See [https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/168/avoid-hardcoding-machine-x64-flag-on-64/diff](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/pull-requests/168/avoid-hardcoding-machine-x64-flag-on-64/diff) for the extended rationale. As `sdf6` is compatible with CMake 2.8.6 \(at least in theory, according to the `cmake_minimum_required` call\) I just disable the hardcoding with CMake >= 3.5.  
Note that when forward merging this to `sdf8`, the hardcoding can be directly removed as the minimum CMake version is 3.10 .
